p: In general, the leaves and extracts of roselle have shown antibacterial, antifungal, antiparasitic, antipyretic, antinociceptic, anti-inflammatory, anti-obesity, antidiabetic, antihypertensive, anti-anemic, anti-cholesterol, diuretic, hepatoprotective, nephroprotective, and antioxidant effects [ 148, 150, 154, 155].
